item.title: CrossFit: Day One
item.description:
I donâ€™t like gyms, but I never knew why until today. Today was my first day doing CrossFit. Let me first get my thoughts out on CrossFit before I explain my discovery.

CrossFit is bad ass {#crossfitisbadass}

Specifically, the trainer we had. She was amazing. She was empathetic yet assertive; firm yet encouraging.
